description: Versatility is freedom. Inspired by British Columbia’s range of terrain, environments and conditions, the Gamma Hoody is an essential softshell for anyone seeking new places and experiences. Wind and weather resistant, the lightweight softshell fabric stretches and breathes. The fit is streamlined, allows room for light layers, and is patterned for freedom of movement. A helmet compatible StormHood™ delivers full coverage without impacting peripheral vision.
name: Arcteryx Gamma Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Wee Burly Double Weave - 56% nylon, 34% polyester, 10% elastane - bluesign Approved Material
